name: cickodes
description: Cickodes is an app that helps developers find a true selected, highlighted awesome; snippet codes, best practices, best how-to-dos and T-shape guides in programming.  This is being developed as self-learning project that would probably turn to be an open source.

scripts.coverage: npm run test && jest --coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Shama IRUTINGABO
